about_the_game:
F.E.R.A.S: The Mystery of Future Island

Inspector Irene Capi has vanished. Her last communication indicated that she had uncovered something important on the isolated and highly advanced W3bbed Island. Now, it’s up to you, Agent Dilo Hardshell, a spy from the F.E.R.A.S headquarters, to embark on this mission to uncover this mystery.

The island is a hub of cutting-edge technology unknown to our intelligence team. Its robotic inhabitants — like the Legged Fish, the Boxing Lobster, and the Turbocharged Seagull — will stop at nothing to hinder your progress. Combining your agility and cunning, you’ll need to utilize your unique skills and our top-tier gadgets to solve the puzzle that the W3bbed Corporation is weaving.

F.E.R.A.S: The Mystery of Future Island is an unforgettable, personality-filled adventure that blends traditional FPS combat with the dynamic thrill of rolling around as a secret agent armadillo.
